Ellipsis.name: --ellipsis-character
Ellipsis.description: Controls the default character used, when no developer-supplied character is present.

Ellipsis.name: --ellipsis-content-first-animation-delay
Ellipsis.description: Controls how long of a delay until the first Ellipsis character is faded out in sequence.

Ellipsis.name: --ellipsis-content-second-animation-delay
Ellipsis.description: Controls how long of a delay until the second Ellipsis character is faded out in sequence.

Ellipsis.name: --ellipsis-pulse-end-opacity
Ellipsis.description: Controls how invisible a Ellipsis character should turn at the end of the "pulse" animation.

Ellipsis.name: --ellipsis-pulse-start-opacity
Ellipsis.description: Controls how visible a Ellipsis character should turn at the start of the "pulse" animation.

Ellipsis.name: character
Ellipsis.description: Changes the character being rendered for the animation.

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Ellipsis,
        Heading,
        Stack,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Stack alignment_x="left" spacing="medium">
    <Button disabled>
        <!--
            NOTE: Wrapping text and Component together to
            prevent `Ellipsis` from getting icon spacing
        -->
        <Text is="span">
            Submit
            <Ellipsis />
        </Text>
    </Button>

    <Heading>
        Loading
        <Ellipsis />
    </Heading>
</Stack>
snippets.title: Ellipsis Preview

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {
        Ellipsis,
        Heading,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Heading>
    Loading
    <Ellipsis character="?" />
</Heading>
snippets.title: Ellipsis Character

data.render:
Ellipsis

Ellipsis is a text-based indicator used to tell the end-user that the Web Application is loading something in the background.

Imports

<script>
    import {Ellipsis} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

Character

You can customize the text character used for the animation via the character property.
